parameters.name: DBClusterVersion
parameters.description: The version of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster. Set the value to **3.0**.

parameters.name: Migrate
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the specifications of the available computing resources that are migrated from AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition to Data Lakehouse Edition. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The zone ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~129857~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
